item.title: Tackling Hugo Integration of Asciidoctor
item.author: brice.dutheil@gmail.com (Brice Dutheil)
item.description: Integrate Asciidoctor as everyone should expect While Hugo comes with Asciidoctor support, they are in reality several issues to account for at this time: While basic rendering of asciidoc files works, we soon encounter problems ; the very first
